name: In Search For My One True Narwhal
name_original: In Search For My One True Narwhal
description:
Help the lonely whale find her one true narwhal. Use your sonar to navigate through the deep blue sea, interact with fishes, and find her love. 

Oh, and there may be sharks.

A game for Global Game Jam 2018

CREDITS:

Gilbert White - Tech & Programming

Amelie Bouita - Sound Desing & Engineering

Me - Game Design, Art, Food Runs, Main Cheerleader
